meanings.definition: The act of evaluating or comparing something against a standard or reference point.
meanings.sent1: In science class, we did benchmarkings to see how our experiment results compared to the expected outcomes.
meanings.sent2: The company used industry benchmarkings to assess their performance against competitors.
meanings.sent3: During the cooking competition, the judges did benchmarkings of each dish to determine the winner.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous benchmarkings of different car models helped her choose the best one for her needs.
meanings.sent5: The benchmarkings of student test scores revealed areas for improvement in the school curriculum.
